full_summary:
### Request for Information: Source Testing and Air Modeling of Ammunition Demilitarization Thermal Treatment System
#### Solicitation Number: W8486-238800

**Overview**
The Canadian government's Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking industry input on the development of a Source Testing and Air Modeling of the Ammunition Demilitarization Thermal Treatment System (ADTTS). As part of this Request for Information (RFI), the DND is soliciting written comments from potential bidders to inform the development of the final solicitation document.

**Key Information:**

* **Solicitation Deadline:** November 15, 2022, at 14:00:00
* **Contracting Authority:** Chris Hunsley, CHRIS.HUNSLEY@forces.gc.ca
* **Security Clearance:** Reliability Status Security Clearance required for suppliers
* **Location of Work:** 17 Wing Det Dundurn, Major Equipment Section, Dundurn Detachment, Camp Dundurn, Dundurn, Saskatchewan, Canada, S0K 1K0

**RFI Documents**

* Available in English and French:
	+ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/14/d1b713da4bd09190d8c1316ecdb0064f/05_w8486-238800_rfi_final_en.pdf
	+ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/14/4899c46a732a20c114f104c3cd77ff3b/05_w8486-238800_rfi_final_fr.pdf

**Additional Information:**

* Bidders are encouraged to submit written comments by the solicitation deadline.
* Bidders are advised that the written comments received will not be specifically shared or referred to in the final solicitation document.
* The procurement of services under this solicitation will not necessarily follow this RFI.

**Submission of Inquiries**
All inquiries regarding this RFI should be directed to Chris Hunsley at CHRIS.HUNSLEY@forces.gc.ca. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.  *** END ***
